content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Extraction and Iron Plate Production Facility at Position (41.0, -82.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (41.0, -82.0) with a drop position at (41.5, -80.5), connected to a Stone Furnace at position (43.0, -82.0).
- Iron Chest at position (41.5, -80.5) storing coal.
- Stone Furnace at position (43.0, -82.0) smelting iron ore into iron plates.
- Burner Inserter at position (43.5, -80.5) waiting for source items, intended to transfer items to the Stone Furnace.

### Iron Ore Extraction and Processing Facility at Position (-15.0, -50.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-15.0, -50.0) with a drop position at (-14.5, -48.5), connected to a Wooden Chest and a Stone Furnace.
- Wooden Chest at position (-14.5, -48.5) storing extracted iron ore.
- Stone Furnace at position (-13.0, -48.0) smelting iron ore into iron plates.
- Additional Stone Furnaces at positions (-11.0, -48.0) and (-9.0, -48.0) currently with no ingredients to smelt.
- Burner Inserter at position (-14.5, -46.5) waiting for source items, intended to transfer items to the Stone Furnace.
- Iron Chest at position (-14.5, -47.5) connected to the Burner Inserter.
- Burner Inserter at position (-14.5, -45.5) waiting for source items, connected to another Burner Inserter.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors with Inserters Waiting for Source Items
- Ensure that the source from which the inserters are supposed to pick items is adequately stocked. This will prevent the inserters from idling and improve efficiency.

### Errors with Full Chests Preventing Mining
- Regularly check and empty chests that are used as drop positions for mining drills to prevent them from becoming full and halting resource extraction.

### Errors with Furnaces Having No Ingredients to Smelt
- Ensure that furnaces are consistently supplied with the necessary ingredients to maintain continuous production. This can involve setting up more efficient logistics or ensuring a steady supply of raw materials.
